post:
Happy Bee Host Offers VPSes in London Starting at $2/mo! (And Managed VPSes, too!)

happy bee host, london, managed, poland March 7, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

Happy Bee Host buzzed by with a nice offer for our readers.

  • SSD-backed VPSes in London start at only $2/mo!

What’s cool about Happy Bee Host is that they offer both traditional unmanaged VPSes and managed VPSes.  For managed system, they offer free tickets (up to 5 per month) and service monitoring.  So if your web server or Postfix server fails, you’ll get alerted.  In the offers below, those marked “Managed” are eligible for this service.  Those marked “Unmanaged” are traditional roll-your-own systems.

Plus they back their services with a 30-day money-back guarantee!

Their WHOIS is public. Their Terms of Service is available on their web site and they accept PayPal.

Here’s a little about Happy Bee Host in their own words:

“We are excited to submit our new virtual server offers with you. This is the third time we are presenting our offers with LowEndBox. We are providing this exclusive lifetime offer for our virtual server plans, starting at just 2 USD per month.

HappyBee Host is a high-performance, low-cost web hosting solutions provider. We operate on a diverse range of flexible products in a highly secured environment coupled with at most customer care. Within a short period, since we have stepped into the competitive web industry, we have left our traces through our competencies, methodologies and business ethics.

We are providing free support (Up to 5 tickets per month) and service monitoring (Apache, MySQL, FTP, Crond, cwpsrv, dovecot and Postfix) for our new SSD Managed server clients. All servers are equipped with a Licensed CWP control Panel.”

Have you been a Happy Bee Host customer? Please share your experience in the comments below.

Now read more to see the offers!

30-Day Money Back Guarantee
If you decide to cancel your account within 30 days of sign up, HappyBee Host will refund you the whole amount. We value customer satisfaction. You just need to open a ticket with our Billing Department and the Cancellation Type should be “Immediate”.
Please let us know if you have any questions/comments and enjoy!
